Found it.  Thanks.  It seems odd that this would be in the 3.3 
sources sin=
ce it is a function available in 3.4.  For someone looking 
at the sources =
for the first time, this is confusing.

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, ginkg=
o_w <ginkgo_w@...> wrote:
>
> Please check the plugins folder of the eclips=
e. You should download 
the
> JDT-SDK file, not just the JDT-runtime file.
=

of=

> the name is "org.eclipse.jdt.junit." . There are "source" in the 
names.=

>

.source_3.3.0.v20080603-2000.jar" , I
> think this can help you
